title: Scrolls
content: after a long rest. Scroll of Spike Growth Shape a piece of ground into hard spikes. A creature walking on the spikes takes 1d4 Piercing damage for every 1.5m it moves. Scroll of Heat Metal Conjure a flaming scimitar in your hand that deals 3d6 Fire damage. It sheds bright light in a 3m radius and dim light in a 6m radius. The blade can be unequipped and equipped again, but has to stay on the spellcaster's person. Scroll of Flaming Sphere Summon a flaming sphere that deals 2d6 Fire damage to near
